message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous.
Meet me halfway, Alice. Let's be fair.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
I'm willing to take a bit more, but not that much. Meet me somewhere in the middle.
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. Let's split it 40/60 this time.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not giving in yet.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting desperate. Let's split it 30/70 this time. It's our last chance to get anything.
